results.title: Better Than Besties: Why Gay Holiday Films Matter
results.abstract: This season’s movies with queer characters may be a largely chaste affair, but their comforting formulas also tell L.G.B.T.Q. viewers that they are seen.

What to Watch: Sci-Fi Movies Led by Women
results.abstract: Aliens aren't all these heroes have to contend with. Check out these films with women at the forefront.

results.title: Barbara Windsor, Beloved British TV and Film Star, Dies at 83
results.abstract: She went from bubbly sex symbol in the “Carry On” films to working-class hero on “EastEnders.” Her private life was often as troubled as her “EastEnders” character’s.

multimedia.caption: The actress Barbara Windsor at the British Academy Television Awards in London in 2009. She was a star of the series “EastEnders” on and off from 1994 to 2016.

results.title: Film Academy Museum Delays Its Opening Again
results.abstract: The Academy Museum of Motion Pictures pushed back its opening to Sept. 30, 2021, from April 30, citing the difficulty of forecasting when public life may begin to normalize.

results.title: Berlin Film Festival Is Delayed. Will Cannes and Venice Follow?
results.abstract: The postponement of the first major international movie event of 2021 raises the specter of another difficult year for the industry.

Kim Ki-duk, Award-Winning South Korean Filmmaker, Dies at 59
results.abstract: He was celebrated for movies centered on society’s underbelly, but he was later accused of sexual misconduct. He died of Covid-19.

results.title: The Small Irish Animation Studio That Keeps Getting the Oscars’ Attention
results.abstract: With “Wolfwalkers,” Cartoon Saloon completes a hand-drawn trilogy based on Celtic mythology. The film epitomizes everything the studio stands for.

results.title: Tom Cruise Erupts at ‘Mission: Impossible’ Crew Over Covid-19 Breach
results.abstract: On a film set in Britain, the actor tore into the crew with an expletive-laden rant. Production of the blockbuster film had previously been delayed by the pandemic.

results.abstract: Among the 72 feature films chosen for the slimmed-down festival are a Tessa Thompson racial-issues drama and a music documentary from Questlove.
